name: Purchase Invoice Register Without GST
query:
select

pi.name as "No",
pi.supplier as "Supplier",
pi.company as "Company",
pi.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date",
pi.due_Date as "Due Date:Date",
pi.bill_no as "Supplier Invoice No",
pi.bill_date as "Supplier Invoice Date:Date",
pii.item_code as "Item Code",
pii.item_name as "Item Name",
pi.purchase_order as "PO No",
pi.transaction_date as "Po Date:Date",
pi.mrn_number as "MRN No",
pi.mrn_date as "MRN Date:Date",
pii.rate as "Rate:Currency",
pii.rate_s as "Bill Rate:Currency",
pii.invoice_quantity as "Bill Qty:Float",
pii.qty as "Acc Qty:Float",
pii.received_qty as "Received QTY:Float",
pii.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float",
pii.short_quantity as "Short QTY:Float",
pii.stock_uom as "UOM",
pii.amount as "Amount:Currency"


 from `tabPurchase Invoice` pi , `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
 where
 pii.parent = pi.name and
 is_return=0 and
 pi.company=%(company)s and
pi.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and pi.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by pi.posting_date desc;
